thread.title: Smog-shrouded Malaysia shuts schools for 2 days

title: Smog-shrouded Malaysia shuts schools for 2 days
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Malaysia on Monday shut most schools nationwide for two days to protect children from a thick, noxious haze caused by smoke from burning for...
